sec.title: Online Journal Archives at Attractive Discount
sec.p: Bentham Science offers online back volumes of all journals on a title-by-title basis at the following discounts:
For existing subscribers: 85% discount on the current years listed subscription price X (multiplied by) the number of years involved.
For new Subscribers: 80% discount on the current years listed subscription price X (multiplied by) the number of years involved.
Others: 70% discount on the current years listed subscription price X (multiplied by) the number of years involved.

sec.title: Payment Options:
sec.p: Payment can be made by Bank (Wire) Transfer, Cheque and Credit Card (Mastercard, Eurocard, Visa or American Express).
All payments should be made to Bentham Science Publishers. All subscriptions back volumes and single issues are paid in US Dollars.

sec.title: Back Volumes:
sec.p: All back volumes can be purchased via our subscription department or via your journal agent. Click here to start an e-mail to request pricing and availability.

sec.title: Purchase Single Issues and Pay-per-view:
sec.p: Single and multiple print issues are available for each journal. To request pricing, please send us an email click here. Our subscription department will then contact you with a quote and ordering information.

sec.title: Pay-per-view:
sec.p: All journals are available online and single articles can be obtained for a document delivery fee from www.eurekaselect.com . For more information on purchasing single issues online, please email us at subscriptions@benthamscience.net.

sec.title: Claims:
sec.p: Claims for missing issues are only accepted within 4 months of dispatch. If your order has been processed via a Subscription Agent, kindly contact them to claim the missing issue(s).

sec.title: Cancellations:
sec.p: No refunds will be made after the first issue of the journal for the year has been dispatched.

sec.title: Ordering and Access:
sec.p: You may order via your local subscription agency (some are listed here) directly online, or contact our subscriptions department at: subscriptions@benthamscience.net. Our content is also accessible from a selection of gateways including SwetsWise, EBSCOhost Electronic Journals and IngentaConnect. Online Institutional Access is available using IP recognition and user name and password.

sec.title: Subscription Options:
sec.p: To view or download our subscription catalogues, please click here. Online subscription prices are valid for single site access only.
There are various subscription options, namely:

sec.title: Print or Online:
sec.p: Print or single site online only ordering option where the standard print or online only rates are charged.

sec.title: Print and Online:
sec.p: In addition to the standard print or online only rate we levy a 10% surcharge for online access in the case of Academic Institutions and a 20% surcharge for Corporate Institutions. This applies to a single site license only.

sec.title: CrossRef:
sec.p: Bentham Science Publishers is a member of CrossRef and all the content of its journals are linked by DOIs through CrossRef.

The DOI, or digital object identifier, serves as a persistent, actionable identifier for intellectual property online. CrossRef is the official DOI registration agency for scholarly and professional publications, including journals, books, and other content types. For further details see: www.crossref.org
